abstract: Protests continue in Burundi despite official warnings after failed military coup; army attempts to disperse protesters by firing on crowd; Pres Pierre Nkurunziza replaces several ministers in cabinet.
lead_paragraph: Officials warned against demonstrations after a failed coup attempt last week. At least 20 people have died in the unrest after President Pierre Nkurunziza’s decision to run for a third term.

headline.main: Hundreds Protest in Burundi’s Capital in Defiance of Ban
headline.print_headline: Hundreds Take to Streets in Burundian Capital, Defying Officials

snippet: Officials warned against demonstrations after a failed coup attempt last week. At least 20 people have died in the unrest after President Pierre Nkurunziza’s decision to run for a third term.

keywords.value: Coups D'Etat and Attempted Coups D'Etat
